Happy.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

Happy.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.

Happy.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy. It's all that matters.

Happy.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.

Sad.quote: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.

Sad.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.

Sad.quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.

Sad.quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.

Sad.quote: Every heart has its secret sorrows which the world knows not.

Sad.quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.

Angry.quote: Speak when you are angry, and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
